an6.22:1.1: “Chayime, bhikkhave, aparihaniye dhamme desessami, tam sunatha …pe…
an6.22:1.2: katame ca, bhikkhave, cha aparihaniya dhamma?
an6.22:1.3: Na kammaramata, na bhassaramata, na niddaramata, na sanganikaramata, sovacassata, kalyanamittata—
an6.22:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha aparihaniya dhamma.
an6.22:2.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam na parihayimsu kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihayimsu kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.22:2.2: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam na parihayissanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihayissanti kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.22:2.3: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi na parihayanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihayanti kusalehi dhammehi”ti.
